text.value: The asset is in location {0}. Replace the current location with location {1}? If you do not want to update the current asset, click Close.
The specified location does not match the location of asset {0}. Clear the current asset? If you do not want to update the current location, click Close.
The Service Request was created successfully.
Are you sure you wish to Cancel? All changes to this request will be lost.

message.defaultMessage: The specified location was not found on this device. Verify that the identifier is correct, or refresh your data when you are online.
The specified asset was not found on this device. Verify that the identifier is correct, or refresh your data when you are online.
The specified priority was not found on this device. Verify that the identifier is correct, or refresh your data when you are online.
An error exists. Click here to view the error.
